title: IIUI students visit Parliament House
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 06 (APP):A group of students from the International Islamic University Islamabad (IIUI), accompanied by faculty members, visited the Parliament House on Monday.
Senior officials of the Senate warmly welcomed the delegation and guided them through the Senate Museum, where they watched an informative documentary showcasing Pakistan’s parliamentary history and the role of the Upper House.
The students were also given a detailed briefing on the legislative process and the working procedures of the Senate.
The delegation showed keen interest in the Senate’s performance, parliamentary traditions, and democratic practices.
Later, the visitors observed the Senate proceedings. The delegation thanked the Senate officials for their hospitality and termed the visit both memorable and informative.
